Title: Paradox
Writer: Christos N. Gage (based on the comic book trilogy "Paradox" created by), Christos N. Gage, Ruth Fletcher
Actors: Kevin Sorbo, Steph Song, Christopher Judge, A.C. Peterson
Plot: Homicide detective Sean Nault, a cop on a parallel Earth whose technology is powered exclusively by magic. Sean investigates a baffling series of murders committed by a means he's never seen before: science. With the aid of Lenoir, a member of the ridiculed subculture of "pragmatists" who believe science is more than the stuff of myths & children's stories, and the 130-year-old sorcerer Winston Churchill, Sean uncovers an ominous plot that will lead him to another dimension and the realization that, unless he prevents it, both earths could well be destroyed.
